H0.text: What is the more common name for birds of the Troglodytidae family. Sparrow

H1.text: What is the more common name for birds of the Troglodytidae family. Finch

H2.text: What is the more common name for birds of the Troglodytidae family. Thrush

H3.text: What is the more common name for birds of the Troglodytidae family. Wren

A4.text: Wrens are a family, Troglodytidae, of small brown passerine birds.

A5.text: In Anglophone regions, the Eurasian wren is commonly known simply as the 'wren', as it is the originator of the name.
